## Diamonds data with Plotly
```{r echo= FALSE, message=FALSE}
df <- diamonds[sample(1:nrow(diamonds), size = 3000),]
 
plot_ly(df, x = df$x, y = df$price, mode = "markers", color = df$cut, size = df$z) %>%
layout(title = "Diamonds")
```
